findings.liver: Normal morphology and echotexture; no focal lesions; no biliary ductal dilatation; no cholelithiasis; no gallbladder wall thickening.
findings.pancreas: Normal echotexture; no edema or fluid collections.
findings.spleen: Normal echotexture and size measuring 8.4 cm.
findings.kidneys: Normal corticomedullary differentiation; no hydronephrosis; no ascites.
findings.atherosclerosis: Atherosclerotic plaque identified throughout the abdominal aorta.
